PersonalStatement.text: Stacy Acosta, born on 1983-05-28, is a Female based in East Scottville, Bermuda. She is Single and holds Bulgarian nationality. Currently working at Brady, Gomez and Webster.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Farmer, Delgado and Burns from 2010 to 2020.
Senior Research Scientist at Brady, Gomez and Webster, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from Quaid-i-Azam University
Master's in Engineering from Monash University

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys woodworking.
